title: START PICKS
body: Riot should create a box at the start of normal games when in champ select  such as make it random so its always not in the same position when seeing the [TOP] [MID] [JG] [ADC] and [SUP]  boxes so when you join u have to click it to chose lanes you want instead of  calling which causes issues. once click on your  preferred position it then goes gray so other players cant click on it, which makes them have to choose something else.
